artist: Joan Mitchell; Tyler Graphics, Ltd., Mount Kisco, New York; Printed by Tyler Graphics, Ltd., Mount Kisco, New York
description: diptych, framed together; abstract images of painterly, zigzag and swirling lines in red, green, dark blue and black; b has concentration of wide blue marks at top center
marks: Signature, Date and Edition LRC on b, in pencil: [21/34  Joan Mitchell  1992]
provenance: Private collection, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2011.
title: Sunflowers II
